description.narrative:
Insatsens övergripande mål:
Overall objective: "To strengthen social cohesion in the Savannah region by promoting the political and economic rights of young people and women, strengthening civil society and the capacity of state institutions at the local level."
Insatsens specifika mål:
Specific objective 1: "To promote the economic rights of vulnerable girls/women and boys/men aged 15-35 through access to training opportunities and facilitating their participation in the definition of development priorities at the local level."
Specific objective 2: "To strengthen women's participation in political and economic life."
Specific objective 3: "To promote multi-stakeholder dialogue and consultation by strengthening the capacities of Civil Society Organizations (CSOs), especially those of youth and women."

Plan International Sverige har ansökt om finansiering av egeninsats om 2 422 422 SEK för projektet "Savanes Motoag: Jeunes et Femmes pour la cohésion sociale dans les Savanes" (Young People and Women for Social Cohesion in the Savannahs) för perioden 2020-2024.
Insatsen syftar till att:
"To strengthen social cohesion in the Savannah region by promoting the political and economic rights of young people and women, strengthening civil society and the capacity of state institutions at the local level."
"To promote the economic rights of vulnerable girls/women and boys/men aged 15-35 through access to training opportunities and facilitating their participation in the definition of development priorities at the local level."
"To strengthen women's participation in political and economic life."
"To promote multi-stakeholder dialogue and consultation by strengthening the capacities of Civil Society Organizations (CSOs), especially those of youth and women."
Plan International Sverige kommer att arbeta i samverkan med de lokala civilsamhällesorganisationerna "Aide et Action International – Afrique" (AEAI – Afrique), "Collectif des Associations Contre L’Impunité au Togo" (CACIT) och "Women In Law and Development in Africa / Femmes, Droit et Développement en Afrique – Section Togo" (WILDAF / FeDDAF –TOGO). Plan International Sverige har det övergripande ansvaret för projektets implementering och koordinering.
Den aktuella insatsen har EU-kommissionens referensnummer EuropeAid/167124/DD/ACT/TG. Insatsen har en total budget på 2 691 589 EUR, vilket motsvarar cirka 27 004 751 SEK. Av detta har Plan International Sverige beviljats 2 422 430 EUR från EU-kommissionen och ansöker om 2 422 422 SEK (cirka 10% ) från Sida.

Plan International Sweden has applied to Sida for funding of 2 422 422 SEK to carry out the EU-project "Savanes Motoag: Jeunes et Femmes pour la cohésion sociale dans les Savanes" (Young People and Women for Social Cohesion in the Savannahs) during 2020-2024.
The project aims to:
"To strengthen social cohesion in the Savannah region by promoting the political and economic rights of young people and women, strengthening civil society and the capacity of state institutions at the local level."
"To promote the economic rights of vulnerable girls/women and boys/men aged 15-35 through access to training opportunities and facilitating their participation in the definition of development priorities at the local level."
"To strengthen women's participation in political and economic life."
"To promote multi-stakeholder dialogue and consultation by strengthening the capacities of Civil Society Organizations (CSOs), especially those of youth and women."
Plan International Sweden will collaborate with the local partner organisations "Aide et Action International" – Afrique (AEAI – Afrique), Collectif des Associations Contre L’Impunité au Togo" (CACIT), and "Women In Law and Development in Africa / Femmes, Droit et Développement en Afrique – Section Togo" (WILDAF / FeDDAF –TOGO). Plan International Sweden has the overall responsibility for the coordination and implementation of the project.
The contribution has the EU Commission reference number EuropeAid/167124/DD/ACT/TG. The contribution's total budget is 2 691 589 EUR, which corresponds to approximately 27 004 751 SEK. The requested support from Sida is 2 422 422 SEK, which corresponds to 10% of the total budget.

tag.narrative: 16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.
